name: webdriverio-mcp-server
description: MCP (Model Context Protocol) Server for Web Automation with WebDriverIO and TypeScript

scripts.test: SKIP_ALLURE_OPEN=1 BROWSERS=chrome,firefox,safari npx wdio run ./wdio.conf.ts && npm run allure:regen-open
scripts.test:chrome: BROWSERS=chrome npx wdio run ./wdio.conf.ts && npm run allure:regen-open
scripts.test:firefox: BROWSERS=firefox npx wdio run ./wdio.conf.ts && npm run allure:regen-open
scripts.test:safari: BROWSERS=safari npx wdio run ./wdio.conf.ts && npm run allure:regen-open
scripts.test:observe: OBSERVE=1 OBSERVE_END=1 BROWSERS=chrome,firefox,safari npx wdio run ./wdio.conf.ts && npm run allure:regen-open
scripts.test:smoke: npx wdio run ./wdio.conf.ts --spec ./tests/smoke/home.smoke.spec.ts && npm run allure:regen-open
scripts.test:a11y: npx wdio run ./wdio.conf.ts --spec ./tests/accessibility/a11y.spec.ts && npm run allure:regen-open
scripts.test:links: npx wdio run ./wdio.conf.ts --spec ./tests/links/link-health.spec.ts && npm run allure:regen-open
scripts.test:forms: npx wdio run ./wdio.conf.ts --spec ./tests/forms/contact-form.spec.ts && npm run allure:regen-open
scripts.test:video: SKIP_ALLURE_OPEN=1 BROWSERS=chrome,firefox,safari npx wdio run ./wdio.conf.ts --spec ./tests/functional/video-products.spec.ts && npm run allure:regen-open
scripts.allure:regen-open: npm run allure:generate && if [ -z "$SKIP_ALLURE_OPEN" ]; then echo 'Opening Allure report... Press Ctrl+C to close when done viewing.' && allure serve reports/allure-results; fi

author: Development Team
